name: Cheddar Biscuits
ingredients: Cooking spray or additional butter for greasing
utensils: Rimmed baking sheet or muffin top pan

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Grease a rimmed baking sheet or muffin top pan.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 200°C. Vymastite plech na pečenie s okrajmi alebo formu na muffiny.
instructions.ja: オーブンを400°F（200°C）に予熱します。縁付きベーキングシートまたはマフィントップパンに油を塗ります。

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, melted butter, salt, and garlic powder.
instructions.sk: V miske vyšľahajte vajcia, rozpustené maslo, soľ a cesnakový prášok.
instructions.ja: ボウルに卵、溶かしバター、塩、ニンニクパウダーを入れ、泡立て器でよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Sift the coconut flour and combine it with the baking powder.
instructions.sk: Preosejte kokosovú múku a zmiešajte ju s práškom do pečiva.
instructions.ja: ココナッツフラワーをふるい、ベーキングパウダーと混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Whisk the flour mixture into the egg mixture until there are no lumps.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte múčnu zmes do vaječnej zmesi, kým nebudú žiadne hrudky.
instructions.ja: 粉類の混合物を卵の混合物に加え、ダマがなくなるまで泡立て器で混ぜます。

instructions.en: Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese.
instructions.ja: シュレッドしたチェダーチーズを折り込みます。

instructions.en: Drop the batter by spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet or muffin top pan, keeping the batter as mounded as possible.
instructions.sk: Lyžicou nakvapkajte cesto na pripravený plech alebo do formy na muffiny, snažte sa, aby cesto zostalo čo najviac nakopené.
instructions.ja: 準備したベーキングシートまたはマフィントップパンに生地をスプーンで落とし、できるだけ山形になるようにします。

instructions.en: Bake for 15 minutes at 400°F (200°C) until as browned as possible without burning.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15 minút pri teplote 200°C, kým nezhnednú čo najviac bez spálenia.
instructions.ja: 400°F（200°C）で15分間、焦げないように注意しながらできるだけ褐色になるまで焼きます。

notes: These keto-friendly cheddar biscuits are best made in a muffin top pan to maintain their shape, but a regular baking sheet will work too. Keep the batter mounded when dropping onto the pan to prevent excessive spreading during baking. The coconut flour gives these biscuits a unique texture and flavor while keeping them low-carb.
